mobs.LongDesc: Wolverine stands here brooding in the corner, grumbling to himself
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Wolverine stands a whopping 5'6", but his retractable Adamantium claws tell
you he is not playing! It would be wise to not make him to upset with you,
his mood is never good!

mobs.LongDesc: Storm hovers here in all her glory awaiting to talk to Professor X
mobs.DetailedDesc:
With her blue eyes and long white hair it is no wonder she is a powerful
force even without her powers over the elements!  She is one of the
most beautiful mutants YOU have ever seen!

mobs.LongDesc: Gambit is standing here thinking of his Gumbo and Rogue
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He stands here in his long tan trenchcoat, with crimson eyes and a long
quarterstaff.  He looks like he could teach you a few things one being
his spicy recipe for Cajun Gumbo.

mobs.LongDesc: Cyclops is here looking for Jean or Professor Xavier
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is a rather stout and well built, he has one red visor across his face
you sense that he could really cause you harm if you made him mad...
He is usually the leader of the X-Men when they go on missions...

mobs.LongDesc: Jean Grey stands here awaiting for Cyclops to arrive
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The right hand in the missions and the groups second set of eyes, even if
they are sitting in the command center at the time.  She has mental abilities
that you could not ever believe, but watch out, this is Cyclops girl!

mobs.LongDesc: Jubilee is standing here complaining about something childish
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She is wearing a yellow jacket, with red oakleys, and an attitude!
She has a wierd glittering about her body, but you notice she isn't to bad
looking either.

mobs.LongDesc: Beast is hanging from the ceiling reading a book
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This blue furry man may not be a GQ cover, but his heart is of gold.
He is usually to be found in the library reading his books and absorbing
all the knowledge he can, but he does go on some missions as well

mobs.LongDesc: Colossus stands here in all his might and size
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is HUGE, he stands about 7 feet tall and is almost totally indestructible!
He is not one you want mad at you in ANY occasion, he doesn't like being
interrupted so you had best leave him alone.

mobs.LongDesc: Rogue is flying over head looking for Gambit
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The southern belle of the X-Men, she is capable of flying and for
some unknown reason she likes that annoying cajun!!  Who are we to judge?
She can drain your energy with a mere touch...

mobs.LongDesc: NightCrawler is here, no there, well he is rotating positions in the room
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A strange creature, black in color, with a tail and claws and the ability
to teleport through walls and anything he chooses...

mobs.LongDesc: Professor Xavier wheels around the room talking of the latest mission
mobs.DetailedDesc:
An elderly man sits before you in this yellow motorized wheelchair, but he is
still wise beyond all the other X-Men in that he knew of how to help them with
their powers, he has the ability of telepathic communication.

mobs.LongDesc: Magneto is here looking for some X-Men to destroy
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is about 5'11 with a red helmet and red flowing cape, he is surrounded
by a magnetic forcefield that seems to repel all things...he controls the
very atmosphere around him with the power of magnetism.

mobs.LongDesc: Juggernaut stands here towering over you and looking for something to break
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He stands well over 6 and a half feet tall, he is heavily armored, and he does
NOT like the X-Men at all, and he doesn't appear to be to thrilled with you!
He is known for running over walls, it looks like your the next target!

mobs.LongDesc: A Sentinel Robot is towering here looking for mutants to capture
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Standing a WHOPPING 40 feet tall, this robot is out looking for mutants to
bring back to those who would like to get rid of all mutants
And his red glowing eyes can see all so you can't hide if your a mutant!!

mobs.LongDesc: SabreTooth is standing here looking for his arch-enemy Wolverine.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He stands about 7 and a half feet tall or more you reckon, either way you feel
very miniscule in comparison to this big yellow maned, muscular, well-built
cat-like man.  He has marking on his ribs and back, he doesn't appear happy!

mobs.LongDesc: A security laser stands here probing the hall for movement
Apocalypse is here standing ready to destroy the X-Men.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Standing a remarkable 8 feet tall and dressed in a blue armor that looks like
a tank couldn't dent it and it looks like he is ready to rip you a new one as
well.  You are going to have a time of it if you try and take him, doesn't
look like your going to have a choice in it  HE'S ATTACKING!!!!

mobs.LongDesc: Proteus the mutant who bends all to his will is here.
ArchAngel flies about searching for intruders.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You notice the wings first thing, he is about 6 foot 6 with a wingspan of
probably 10 feet or more.  A WINGSPAN?!?!?!  That's correct he has wings and
he is using them!  You better retreat as he is the guardian of the bedrooms of
the Xmen!  He won't like you here intruding!

mobs.LongDesc: A thundercloud is here rumbling and spitting lightning at you
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A dark ominous cloud with lightning ripping from it and cracking by you.  It is
a minion of Storm and she commands it to attack you!!!!

mobs.LongDesc: A whirling tornado is ripping up the room and is heading towards you
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A whirling instrument of destruction heading towards you at the whim of its
master Storm as it defends it's master you had better run for your life!

mobs.LongDesc: A blizzard is here freezing everything in sight
mobs.DetailedDesc:
White is all you can see.  There is nothing but the biting cold and the whirl
of the snow in the air.  You feel the need to run as you lose feeling in your
extremities, then you see Storm smile as she controls this little change
in the weather.
